descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Welcome to the Racket-Verse: Where Great Racket Sports Meet Great Community

Step into a multi-sport game featuring four distinct racket sports!  Meet, compete and have fun together in a world where **realistic racket sports physics meet a vibrant social scene** to experience the spirit of your local racket club in VR.

Play in **singles or doubles** matches, join **public groups** to meet new players and challenge yourself. You can also set up **private groups** with friends, enjoying matches and conversations with people you already know.

‎

# New Update: New sports, a redesigned club, and an in-game shop
Pickleball is in the main Club, and you can now play table tennis in our Lab! 
We also have a redesigned club for you to enjoy, complete with a shop where you can earn coins through daily and weekly in-game missions to buy cosmetic items. 

‎

# Key Features:
🎾 **Incredible Racket Sports Physics** – Feel every shot with physics that faithfully recreate the dynamics of real-world racket sports.

🎮 **Multiplayer Modes** – Enjoy singles or doubles matches.

🤖 **Single Player Mode** – Play against highly skilled AI bots.

🏆 **Career Mode** – Rise through the ranks in a single-player mode!

🏟️ **Spectate and Interact** – Watch live matches courtside.

👫 **Private and Public Groups** – Create private games and groups to challenge your friends or join public matches.

🏸 **Racket Sports Variety** – Pickleball, Table Tennis, Box Tennis and Spinminton.
‎
‎

# Join the Club today!
